communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: OTG Management NLRB
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Case Number: 04-CA-296335
Date Filed: 05/23/2022
Status: Closed
Location: Philadelphia, PA
Region Assigned: Region 04, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania

Also related case 

Case Number: 04-CA-296328
Date Filed: 05/23/2022
Status: Closed
Location: Philadelphia, PA
Region Assigned: Region 04, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Anonymous

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Phyllis Mierzwa (deceased)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1.) Any and all records mentioning, concerning, or referencing Phyllis Mierzwa, also known as Phyllis Vannostrand (October 17, 1953 - April 22, 2015). Records concerning Phyllis Mierzwa, also known as Phyllis Vannostrand, as a subject should be presumed exempt from the FOIA Exemption 6, 7(C) and the Privacy Act, as subject is deceased.

PROOF OF DEATH: https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/210013219/phyllis-marie-van_nostrand

ADDITIONAL PROOF OF DEATH: SEE ATTACHMENT OF STATE OF FLORIDA DEATH CERTIFICATE FOR Phyllis Mierzwa, also known as Phyllis Vannostrand

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Alice Borne
